import React from "react"; import { Form, Card, Button, Tabs, DatePicker, Input, Select } from "antd"; import { addEmployee } from "../../../actions/employee/employeeActions"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Row, Col } from "antd"; import moment from "moment"; const { TabPane } = Tabs; const { Option } = Select; const AddEmployee = (props) => { const [locationArray, setLocationArry] = useState(props.location); const [projectArray, setProjectArry] = useState(props.projects); const layout = { labelCol: { span: 4, }, wrapperCol: { span: 24, }, }; const onFinish = (values) => { const newEmp = { ...values, DOB: moment(values.DOB).format("YYYY-MM-DD"), DOJ: moment(values.DOJ).format("YYYY-MM-DD"), }; console.log("Success:", newEmp); props.addEmployee(newEmp); }; const onFinishFailed = (errorInfo) => { console.log(">>>>Failed>>>:", errorInfo); }; const [form] = Form.useForm(); return (

Add New Employee
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ auth: state.auth, messages: state.messages, employee: state.employee, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { addEmployee })(AddEmployee);
